parameters.jsCode:
// Sample global employee data
const employees = [
  {
    employeeId: "EMP-001",
    fullName: "Yuki Tanaka",
    email: "yuki.tanaka@company.com",
    phone: "+81 3-1234-5678",
    passport: "JP123456789",
    nationalId: "1234567890123",
    address: "1-2-3 Shibuya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0002, Japan",
    dateOfBirth: "1985-05-20",
    department: "Engineering",
    position: "Senior Developer",
    salary: 8500000,
    currency: "JPY",
    country: "Japan",
    workPermit: "WP-JP-2024-001",
    emergencyContact: {
      name: "Hiroshi Tanaka",
      phone: "+81 90-1234-5678",
      relationship: "Father"
    }
  },
  {
    employeeId: "EMP-002",
    fullName: "Emma Thompson",
    email: "emma.thompson@company.com",
    phone: "+44 20 7946 0958",
    passport: "GB987654321",
    nationalId: "9876543210",
    address: "123 Baker Street, London NW1 6XE, United Kingdom",
    dateOfBirth: "1990-08-15",
    department: "Marketing",
    position: "Marketing Manager",
    salary: 55000,
    currency: "GBP",
    country: "United Kingdom",
    workPermit: "WP-UK-2024-002",
    emergencyContact: {
      name: "James Thompson",
      phone: "+44 7700 900123",
      relationship: "Husband"
    }
  },
  {
    employeeId: "EMP-003",
    fullName: "Carlos Rodriguez",
    email: "carlos.rodriguez@company.com",
    phone: "+34 91 123 45 67",
    passport: "ES456789123",
    nationalId: "45678912345",
    address: "Calle Gran VÃ­a 123, 28013 Madrid, Spain",
    dateOfBirth: "1988-12-03",
    department: "Sales",
    position: "Sales Director",
    salary: 75000,
    currency: "EUR",
    country: "Spain",
    workPermit: "WP-ES-2024-003",
    emergencyContact: {
      name: "Maria Rodriguez",
      phone: "+34 91 987 65 43",
      relationship: "Wife"
    }
  }
];

// Return each employee as a separate item for processing
return employees.map(employee => ({
  json: employee
}));

**This workflow uses default settings:**
- **`preserveStructure: false`** (default)
- **`includeMetadata: false`** (default)

### What this means:
- **Simple output** - Original data is overwritten with censored data
- **Clean results** - No extra properties, just censored data
- **Easy to use** - Straightforward data structure

### Data Structure:
